headings.usage: Use for all section headers, modal titles, and hero text. Avoid generic Inter for headings.

code.usage: Prompts, code snippets, JSON outputs, and API keys.

primary.name: Electric Indigo
primary.usage: Primary actions, active states, key highlights.

background.usage: Main app background. Avoid pure black in dark mode, use #09090B.

spacing.base: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for containers.

grid.bento: Use col-span-2 or row-span-2 for emphasis.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). High contrast.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (border-border), bg-card. No heavy shadows.

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle noise textures or mesh gradients in empty states.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

hero_background.usage: Subtle background for login or welcome screen (low opacity).

abstract_data.usage: Visual accent for the 'Optimization' or 'Dataset' generation steps.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do not apply universal transition (transition: all).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' archetype. Prioritize clarity and data density for this developer tool. Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds and empty states. Ensure the 'Manrope' font is used for headings to give it a distinct personality.
